S04bsu025_u:1_0: atha te tīrthikā upalambhadṛṣṭayaḥ savikalpāḥ savitarkā mahāyānikamupasṛtya sādarakṛtāñjalipuṭā nairātmyapraśnaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - nairātmakaṃ śarīramiti kulaputra sarvajñena nirdiśyate /
S04bsu025_u:1_1: yadi śarīraṃ nairātmakam, paramātmā na vidyate / tat kasmātsakāśādete hasitaruditakrīḍitakrodhamānerṣyāṃpaiśunyādayaḥ samutpadyante? tadasmākaṃ saṃdehaṃ mocayitumarhati bhagavān - kimasti śarīre paramātmā,
S04bsu025_u:2_0: mahāyānikāḥ prāhuḥ - mārṣāḥ, śarīre paramātmā astītyucyate,
S04bsu025_u:2_1: na hi nāstīti / dvayamatra nocyate / asti paramātmetyucyamāne mārṣā mithyāpralāpaḥ /
S04bsu025_u:2_2: yadyasti, tatkathaṃ mārṣāḥ keśanakhadantacarmaromasirāmāṃsāsthimedamajjāsnāyuplīhāntranālaśiraḥkaracaraṇāṅgasakalaśarīre sa bāhyābhyantare vicāryamāṇe na dṛśyate paramātmā?
S04bsu025_u:3_0: tīrthikāḥ prāhuḥ - na dṛśyate kulaputra paramātmā /
S04bsu025_u:4_0: mahāyānikāḥ prāhuḥ - na mārṣā divyacakṣuṣo 'pi paśyanti /
S04bsu025_u:4_1: yasya na varṇo na rūpaṃ na saṃskāraḥ,
S04bsu025_u:6_1: yadi nāsti, tatkathamasya ete hasitaruditakrīḍitakrodhamānerṣyāpaiśunyādayaḥ saṃbhavanti? tena nāstīti vaktuṃ na pāryate /
S04bsu025_u:7_0: tīrthikāḥ prāhuḥ - yadi kulaputra nocyate astīti vā nāstīti vā, tatkimatrālambanaṃ bhavatu?
S04bsu025_u:8_0: mahāyānikāḥ prāhuḥ - na mārṣāḥ kiṃcidālambanaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu025_u:13_0: tīrthikāḥ prāhuḥ - kīdṛśī maya, kīdṛśaḥ svapnaḥ, kidṛśa indrajāla iti?
S04bsu025_u:14_2: indrajālaḥ kṛtrimaprayogaḥ / evaṃ mārṣāḥ sarve svapnamāyendrajālasadṛśā draṣṭavyāḥ /
S04bsu025_u:14_3: punaraparaṃ dvau bhedau vinirdiṣṭau yaduta saṃvṛtiḥ paramārthaśca /
S04bsu025_u:14_4: Nparipṛ, Vaidya 175) paraḥ / evaṃ jīvaḥ puruṣaḥ pudgalaḥ kārakaḥ vedakaḥ /
S04bsu025_u:14_6: sā saṃvṛtirnāma / yatra nātmā na paraḥ, evaṃ na jīvo na pudgalaḥ na puruṣaḥ na kārakaḥ na vedakaḥ na dhanaṃ - - - - - sā madhyamā pratipattirdharmāṇām /
S04bsu025_u:18_0: muktimārgaṃ na paśyanti andhā bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ /
S04bsu025_u:19_1: paramārthaṃ na jānanti bhavo yatra nirudhyate /
S04bsu025_u:20_1: bhavaṃ cyutiṃ tathā loke punarāyānti yānti ca // 6 //
S04bsu025_u:22_1: cyutirasti ca sarveṣāṃ tatsarvaṃ saṃvṛteḥ phalam // 8 //
S04bsu025_u:23_1: punaste narakaṃ yānti tatsarvaṃ saṃvṛteḥ phalam // 9 //
S04bsu025_u:27_0: na kāṭhinyaṃ na ca mṛdutvaṃ na coṣṇaṃ naiva śītalam /
S04bsu025_u:27_1: na saṃsparśaṃ na ca grāhyaṃ bodhicittasya lakṣaṇam // 13 //
S04bsu025_u:28_0: na dīrghaṃ nāpi vā hrasvaṃ na piṇḍaṃ na trikoṇakam /
S04bsu025_u:28_1: na kṛśaṃ nāpi na sthūlaṃ bodhicittasya lakṣaṇam // 14 // (#
S04bsu025_u:29_0: na śveta nāpi raktaṃ ca na kṛṣṇaṃ na ca pītakam /
S04bsu025_u:33_0: sarvaṃ ca tena sādṛśyaṃ niḥsāraṃ budbudopamam /
S04bsu025_u:35_0: abhrāntare yathā vidyut kṣaṇādapi na dṛśyate /
S04bsu025_u:36_0: krīḍitaṃ hasitaṃ nityaṃ jalpitaṃ ruditaṃ tathā /
S04bsu025_u:36_1: nṛtyaṃ gītaṃ tathā vādyaṃ sarvaṃ svapnopamaṃ hi tat // 22 //
S04bsu025_u:37_1: svapnaṃ ca cittasaṃkalpaṃ cittaṃ ca gaganopamam // 23 //
S04bsu025_u:38_1: sa sa rvapāpanirmuktaḥ prāpnoti paramaṃ padam // 24 //
